Short Description: with birria consomme and roasted corn and roasted red pepper over sazon rice
Long Description: Slow braised birria beef served with roasted corn and roasted red pepper over sazon rice, finished with a rich birria consomme for deep, slow-cooked flavor.

Short Description: with creamy sun-dried tomato sauce and roasted zucchini and roasted cremini mushrooms over basmati rice
Long Description: Tuscan style chicken served with roasted zucchini and roasted cremini mushrooms over basmati rice, finished with a creamy sun dried tomato sauce (dairy free available).

Short Description: with red wine rosemary jus and roasted broccolini and pickled red onions over herb roasted baby potatoes
Long Description: Garlic and rosemary marinated steak served with roasted broccolini and pickled red onions over herb roasted baby potatoes, finished with a red wine rosemary jus.

Short Description: with lemon-caper dill sauce and roasted broccoli and roasted rainbow carrots over wild rice
Long Description: Pan seared salmon served with roasted broccoli and roasted rainbow carrots over wild rice, finished with a bright lemon caper dill sauce.

Short Description: Our classic chicken bone broth slow-simmered for 24 hours
Long Description: Our classic chicken bone broth slow-simmered for 24 hours with fresh herbs and spices

Short Description: Strawberry chia pudding with granola and fresh blueberries
Long Description: Our classic chia pudding base mixed with an organic freeze-dried strawberry powder topped with crunchy granola and fresh blueberries
